whatIs.title: What Is Search Engine Optimization (SEO)?
descriptionParagraphs: Search Engine Optimization, or SEO, is the practice of improving your website’s visibility in search engine results like Google, Bing, and others.
When done right, SEO helps you appear at the exact moment people are searching for the products or services you offer — without paying for ads.

But SEO is more than keywords and links. It's a long-term digital strategy built on relevance, authority, and user experience. From optimizing website structure and loading speed to creating helpful content and earning backlinks, SEO is the foundation of sustainable online growth.
Whether your goal is to get found locally or rank internationally, SEO is the smartest investment you can make for your brand.

faqs.question: How long does it take to see SEO results ?
faqs.answer: SEO is a long-term investment. Most websites start seeing results in 3–6 months, but timing depends on your competition, website quality, and strategy. At Interacti Marketing Agency, we aim for both short-term gains and long-term growth.

faqs.question: What’s the difference between SEO and paid ads ?
faqs.answer: SEO builds organic traffic over time, offering sustainable results without ongoing ad spend. Paid ads deliver immediate visibility but disappear when you stop paying. The ideal strategy includes both — and we can help you balance them.

faqs.question: Can SEO work for small businesses ?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. In fact, local SEO is one of the most effective tools for small businesses to reach nearby customers and compete with bigger players online.

faqs.question: Is SEO still relevant with AI and ChatGPT taking over search ?
